storyInfo: The entire Self-Salvation Corps plunges into a crisis because of Golding's mistake, and Lettou attempts to break her psychological defense. Meanwhile, the Duke of Caster's emissary, the 'Trilby Asher,' provides Rhodes Island an opportunity for cooperation.

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You're here, Golding.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Lettou... You know us better than I ever imagined.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The Londinium Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Where did you get this information from?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Does it matter?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Have a seat, Lady Golding. Please, there is no reason for you to feel anxious.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: This war is not between you and I.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Answer me, Lt. Colonel.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I know why you came, Golding. You want to buy time.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You are under the impression you have enough leverage to discuss terms. You think you can still help your friends.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: How regrettable. I thought you would be wiser.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: We had a conversation not too long ago.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: You said you did not want to see Londinium become the next Lingones.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Take a look around us. Take a look at the deep abyss that Londinium is plunging into.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Is this the choice you made for yourself that you spoke about?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Golding... Didn't you rebut me on that?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Correct, we are plunging toward that abyss. War has begun. War once tore apart Gaul, our homeland.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What will it tear apart this time? Maybe it will be the Sarkaz. Maybe it'll be Victoria.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You know how disastrous this will be. Hundreds of thousands... Millions of people will—
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Will bleed, die, and buried by this era.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You know that better than anyone!
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: That is correct. I know this very well, but I must also admit that it was you who opened my eyes. You made me reflect on my decision.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: If I had to question my conscience—
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I would not have cared nearly as much.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Let us cast aside those hypocritical high hopes of 'mankind' or 'civilization,' Golding.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: When we were young, we talked freely of these subjects and, with nothing but admiration in our hearts, sung the praises of the outstanding men and women in history.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Mankind, the master of all things! Our intelligence and bravery set us apart from wild beasts and graced these lands with this radiant miracle!
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: But if we simply lifted our heads from the books and compare, we would realize how close their endings are to the reality before us.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The same downfalls, the same rottennesses, the same self-destructions.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What if all those things we sing the praises of were nothing but temporary illusions? What if believing that they are eternal makes us naive?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What if destruction was our true nature?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You weren't so pessimistic before, Lettou.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Pessimistic.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Golding, you are so kind with your choice of words. You described my crazed musings as just 'pessimistic.'
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I thought I warranted harsher criticism.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: It seems... you are not as resolute as I thought you would be.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I am simply... exhausted.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I merely started to try facing reality. It is very painful, but I have no other choice.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: As for the conversation we had the other day, I can now offer you a new answer.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I did not choose any missions for myself, Lady Golding.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I only wanted to survive... the ceaseless destruction.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: It's pitiful and weak, insignificant and inadequate, but this is the answer I arrived at, and it is the only one I have to offer.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What else can I do?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You're a soldier. You should've...!
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Followed orders? Whose orders should I have followed? The King is dead, the Sarkaz run the parliament, and each duke has his own master plan.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You could have—
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: —become a hero?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: At what cost?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What if the price... is not one that I can afford?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: When you walked into the room, did you see the eyes of the guard standing by the door?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The officers under me, my comrades, and those bewildered young men... Till has five children, Sasan's mother has been paralyzed for three years, and Totten's brother has Oripathy.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The vampires will suck their blood dry.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Bowing down will not prevent anything.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: At the very least... Nothing has happened yet, as of today.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Golding, it's my hope that you survive this as well, speaking personally.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Fundamentally, you and I might just be of a kind. It's only that I have chosen to give up, while you are still standing firm.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You and I are nothing alike.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: You asked me where I obtained the information on the Londinium Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Very well, I shall answer you. From a cowardly teacher.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What are you saying...?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Look at yourself, Golding. Your blunders and the tracks you left behind are owed to your cowardice and fear.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Sentimental kinds have never been a good fit for intelligence work. You've known that from the start.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: No, it can't be!
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: There's been a lot of chatter on my communications here.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: The Sarkaz ambushed... the Camden Borough safe house... We.... Their forces...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Alert... The safe house at Auchterigg...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Hello? Can anyone hear me? This is the Magna Borough safe house. We're under...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Golding, they are dying because of you.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: You pushed them into the fire.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: This is what your 'fight' brings.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: And for that, I can only mourn.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: There's too many men. They're well-equipped, and they're working far too well with each other.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Mercenaries aren't capable of this. These are military elites.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Each and every one of them is a bloodthirsty machine who dug his way out of a thousand battles.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Out of the way, the lot of ya!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Indra, watch your back!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: This isn't going to work. We are on the back foot right now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I will locate the position of their commander. Amiya, maintain formation. Don't stop.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I-I got it!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Damn, there's more of them down this alley!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Stay close, Doctor. We will cut our way through!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.text: 'Go forward three hundred meters and take the first left.'

attributes.content: Who's that?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.text: 'Hurry up. There are more ambushers on the roof.'

attributes.content: Doctor, did you hear that? That voice...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Watch out for their Arts! Cut through this danger zone!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Hold on tight, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Let's listen to that voice.;We have to give it a shot.

attributes.content: I hate being ordered around! Tsk, fine!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Bloody... That's a wall there!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Some kind of illusion, perhaps? Charge through it!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: *pant*...*pant*....
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: There's no one I hate more than a sneaky bastard like you! Show yourself!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.text: 'That assassin of yours has already taken down the commander of your pursuers. You are safe for the time being.'

attributes.content: I said, show yourself!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.text: 'Her name is Ascalon, is it? Impressive.'

attributes.content: Doctor, behind me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: 'Please, there is no need to fret, dear Rhodes Islanders. A few of my colleagues just touched base with Alexandrina not too long ago. Alas, it did not go too well.'

attributes.content: You are... the man behind Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Show yourself.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I won't say it again.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Please lower your hammer, Your Highness. You are merely wasting your strength.
As heir to the throne—from a certain viewpoint, at least—you should have a bit more patience.
You said so yourself not too long ago. That we should have... a 'conversation.'
You had the Self-Salvation Corps tapped.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Their evacuation plan will be successful. Do note that this is a promise, not sarcasm.
My sincerest pleasure to meet all of you, ladies and gentlemen. I hope there yet remains room for our objectives to coexist.
An ashen trilby...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Very perceptive, Lady Isabelle Montague. I should have expected no less from a scion of the Count of Manchester. Indeed, we are often referred to as the 'Trilby Ashers.'
Should you have the chance, please send your mother my regards.
You—
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Please, there is no need for alarm, Lady Montague. I harbor no ill will against you and your friends, at the moment.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Is the Arts gimmick you have over there a gesture of your goodwill, too?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I'm not fond of having conversations next to a pile of explosives.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: This is merely a precaution.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Well then, here's a precaution, too.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Lower your weapon, Miss Ascalon. This is not worth it.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals, made a series of passage and call permit requests for so-called 'industrial waste recycling and processing' purposes, currently hiding within the territory of the Duke of Gododdin.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Currently six hundred and thirty-one kilometers away from Londinium.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And what if we are?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss Amiya, I surmise your recycling work is proceeding apace?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: You know Rhodes Island well.;......;Looks like the Victorian bigwigs aren't completely oblivious to us.

attributes.content: We do merely what must be done.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You have been very careful. You charted your course and built a well-hidden supply network around your ship. You wish to avoid Victoria's attention.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And you almost fooled us.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Regardless of whether your intentions are good or otherwise, wouldn't you agree that discretion is the worst quality there is to a ruler?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: Who do you serve, Mr. 'Trilby Asher?'

attributes.content: If at all possible, I would say that I serve Victoria.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Alas, the reality is that I serve only a small part of Victoria. This small part is more than enough to keep me well occupied, however.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: Which means you work for one of the dukes.
If the Duke of Wellington saw us as a threat—
Rhodes Island would already have been attacked.
The Duke of Windermere's control has yet to reach Duke Gododdin's territory. Not by a long shot.
From what I know, the Duke of Normandy is more interested in business.
Most other dukes are fence sitters.

attributes.content: 'Doctor,' the commander of Rhodes Island... There exists very little information on you. We were under the impression that this was due to a lack of importance.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: We will reevaluate our internal appraisal.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: What is Rhodes Island worth to that 'part of Victoria' you speak of?

attributes.content: We actually do not have much of an interest in a so-called pharmaceutical company that deals in waste recycling.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But your operator has a very unique background. Moreover, she possesses something important.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You've failed once, but you still haven't given up.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is my job, Your Highness. Let us not make things harder for each other.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This sword is nothing more than a heavy rod of iron in your hands.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What do you intend to do with it? Can you really cut through the Catastrophe that looms above us?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It is a mere tale. You cannot wield it to its true potential.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What does Duke of Caster want to do with it, then?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: To fulfill a promise.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: A promise?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: To bring her followers peace and safety.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: We do indeed have certain... technologies that can immediately put this blade to good use, just as the Sighs of Kings once sheltered Londinium.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Duke wishes for this blade to become a turning point for unity.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: In that case, those who aren't on your side will deservedly be swallowed by the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That is how it will become that turning point.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: (Doctor, I will make my move in three seconds. We must escape this situation.)
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: (Our operators on the landship are more than capable of taking care of the crisis that could soon unfold... and so we have to take this risk.)
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: (Three.)
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: (Two.)
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: (One.)
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: All of you seem pretty tense. Perhaps I came at a bad time?
Right on time.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Ines.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Mr. 'Trilby Asher,' you have to admit that you came well-prepared.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Thirteen small communication stations, with four of them triggered passively. They were set up to automatically send out orders if they don't receive your message after ten minutes.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I didn't want to venture a guess as to what orders they were meant to send out, so I took the liberty of crushing them all.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I hope you don't mind.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Your subordinates were very strong, even after they heard the word Vampire.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That said, I believe that aside from the Sarkaz Royal Court, there are certain others hiding in the city who would be very interested to learn of their existence.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Tell me, where do you suppose I should take them?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ines, former Sarkaz mercenary... It's hardly surprising that you are still alive. We've determined for some time now that someone was behind all these little tricks around Londinium.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You've done very well.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: We know that there is a sizable number of Sarkaz mercenaries inclined to leave the Military Commission's control, but we both know that does not come without a cost, don't we?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Your business partner... might be in fairly dire straits.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Perhaps we should be a little more blunt with each other.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I know you have more tricks up your sleeve, and you know we still have some trump cards in our hand. Let's stop probing each other.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Your shadow tells me you are wavering.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Very well. Let's make a deal.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I have a tricky mission, but as you can see, I am not much for fighting and adventure.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: So you want someone to die in your stead.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I have faith in your abilities.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Certainly you have already seen the airship that is currently parked at the now-isolated Norport Borough.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Make your way there and get your hands on its schematics.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You get to live. For now.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You, your friends, your allies, your wounded, and your landship all get to remain alive for the time being.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is no trouble at all to Victoria, but as for the rest of you...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'
